maintainer.content: Maintainer of the Networks module in aeon and all of three Deep Learning sub-modules for Classification / Regression / Clustering.
Maintaining the ROCKET GPU implementations in the transformation module.
Maintaining the ShapeDTW similarity measure in the distances module.

mentor.content: As part of the Google Summer of Code (GSoC) program under the affiliation of NumFOCUS, I am mentoring Aadya Chinubhai on a project that focuses on implementing in aeon-toolkit deep learning based models for time series clustering. More details about the GSoC project here and detailed weekly updated Medium blogs here.
